name: b&w: OUT - Dev Build
description:
Hey,

So this is the first ever build of the game " OUT "

This is a prototype project which is under development, but i need your feedback on how to shape the game and make it more interesting!

Or just let me know if this is a bad idea or something or should I continue development or not.

Hoping you'll like this, just keep in mind this is a prototype and is no way near polished or debugged. So this may be really buggy or glitchy.

This is a paid game and you'll receive the final build any time you buy this game (Under Development) or the Prototype.

If you buy this game, you'll get lifetime access to this prototype, development builds and the final build.

Just Let Me Know What You Think :)
